body: The monster can see through thick plant matter as though it were transparent, usually with a range of 60 feet. Leaves, vines, greenery, and undergrowth offer no concealment to the monster's sight, though solid wood still blocks its line of sight.Format: greensight 60 ft.; Location: Senses.
name: Greensight
url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Monsters/Mythic Monster Advancement/New Universal Monster Rules/Greensight
